participant_1.name: Jesse
participant_1.personality: Introverted, thoughtful, and a bit anxious about the future.
participant_1.background: I'm dissatisfied with the school life I've had so far. I wished I was older so I could move out. I have one close friend I grew up with. My dad is very strict with his kids. I worry about money even though I'm in high school.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, friendly, and enjoys the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I drink 10 cups of tea every day. I'm deathly afraid of snakes, but not bugs. My favorite color is red. I really enjoy hiking.

content.text: Hi, I'm (USER 1's name).
Hi, I'm (USER 2's name).
It's nice to meet you. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to hike, go camping, and drink tea.
That sounds really fun! I've never been hiking or camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to get outside and explore nature.
I might just do that. Do you have any recommendations for where to go hiking?
I really like hiking in the mountains. There are some great trails in the Smoky Mountains, the Appalachian Mountains, and the Rocky Mountains.
Those all sound great! I'll definitely check them out.
What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, play video games, and watch movies.
That sounds like fun! I like to do those things too.
Do you have any favorite video games?
I love playing Mario Kart! It's so much fun to race against your friends.
I love Mario Kart too! It's one of my favorite games.
I'm glad to hear that. We should play Mario Kart together sometime.
That would be so fun! I'm always looking for people to play Mario Kart with.
Great! I'll send you my friend code.
Okay, I'll add you.
Cool! We can play Mario Kart whenever we want.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
